title: TDSB Connects App
description:
Student can only use the app on the phone, not the website.
 i. The student needs to use the student number, not the email, to log in to this app.
 ii. The password will be the same as the one used for other platforms.

title: Student cannot see the timetable
description:
i. The timetable will be available 7 days prior to the start of the new semester.
 ii. If the timetable is not available after that period, make a ticket including screenshots (SS) and send it to MWD.
